items.content_html: custom-categorize is a lightweight library designed to help you categorize data based on custom filtering logic. Built with flexibility in mind, the library offers: Default filtering: Use built-in logic for common grouping scenarios. Custom filtering: Pass your own filter function to tailor the categorization process to your data.
items.title: Cabraham1/custom-categorize: custom-categorize is a lightweight library designed to help you categorize data based on custom filtering logic. Built with flexibility in mind, the library offers:  Default filtering: Use built-in logic for common grouping scenarios. Custom filtering: Pass your own filter function to tailor the categorization process to your data.
